description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission PP/2014/4623 dated 31/10/2014 for Part single, part two storey rear extension (following demolition of existing conservatory and two storey rear extension); construction of basement, partly under rear garden; with light well; hip to gable roof extension on north side with gable windows at first and second floor level; rear roof extension incorporating 2 x Juliet balconies; 2 x dormer windows in front roofslope and traditional railings installed to first floor front elevation. Amendment seeks to revise plans to simplify the complexity and construction/engineering operations to form the below ground concrete basement 'box' and incorporate amended space planning requirements to the basement accommodation. (Non-Material Amendments)
